message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it a bit too close for me.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,000?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500? I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our previous offers.
